title: Curios about the Alpha Client
body: So today i got like "accepted" into the alpha client thing. I was skyping with my friend at the time and he also said he got accepted. So did you guys just accept a bunch of ppl today?

replies.body:
We send invites out in waves, so it's *very likely* a wave of invites went out today. Welcome to the Alpha Client! I hope you have a lot of fun with it! ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Ah, that makes sense, and so far the client is beautiful, loving it so far. ^.^
